transArray.content: Excellent, the service staff are very friendly, the location is convenient, the room is very clean, and the breakfast is also very tasty!

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. Our hotel is located near the West Fourth Ring Auxiliary Road and Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, allowing you to have a worry-free trip. I'm glad to hear about your positive impression of our hotel in your review. Before guests check in, we will conduct ward rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets to ensure that all guest supplies are changed "one for each guest". Please feel free to check in. Breakfast has now resumed as a buffet breakfast, and the meals are updated from time to time to provide you with a balanced Nutrition and taste bud enjoyment. It is our responsibility to provide you with high-quality services. Thank you for your recognition of us. We will continue to do a good job in all aspects. I believe you will get a better stay experience next time you stay. The hotel looks forward to it See you again and wish you a happy life!
